24/04/2024
Data: are there any restrictions using, adapting preserving and/or sharing the datasets that you reuse? are there copyrights, licenses, did you purchase data or sign a transfer agreement? 
Preservation: RDR is a data repository intended for data publishing, this will also preserve your data but RDR can't be used for preservation alone, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr you can find other storage solutions to preserve your data in the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. 
Will preserve and/or share the reused data as well, is that allowed, or will they be available at the source for the next 10 years?
label: good with suggestions
